description.value: Record of measurements from an acoustic reflex test, and their clinical interpretation.

purpose.value: To record measurements from an acoustic reflex test, and their interpretation by a clnician.

definition.value: Record of measurements from an acoustic reflex test, and their clinical interpretation.
